verses.verse: And Jesus entered <S%G1525><s%> and passed <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1330><s%> Jericho. <S%G2410><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was a man <S%G435><s%> named <S%G2564><s%> Zacchaeus, <S%G2195><s%> which <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846><s%> was the chief <S%G754><s%> among the publicans, <S%G754><s%> and he was rich. <S%G4145><s%>

And he sought <S%G2212><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> he was; and could <S%G1410><s%> not for the press, <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he was little <S%G3398><s%> of stature. <S%G2244><s%>

And he ran <S%G4390><s%> before, <S%G1715><s%> and climbed <S%G305><s%> up into <S%G1909><s%> a sycomore <S%G4809><s%> tree <S%G4809><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> him: for he was to pass <S%G1330><s%> that way.

And when <S%G5613><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to the place, <S%G5117><s%> he looked <S%G308><s%> up, and saw <S%G1492><s%> him, and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Zacchaeus, <S%G2195><s%> make <S%G4692><s%> haste, <S%G4692><s%> and come <S%G2597><s%> down; <S%G2597><s%> for to day <S%G4594><s%> I must <S%G1163><s%> abide <S%G3306><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> your house. <S%G3624><s%>
And he made <S%G4692><s%> haste, <S%G4692><s%> and came <S%G2597><s%> down, <S%G2597><s%> and received <S%G5264><s%> him joyfully. <S%G5463><s%>

And when they saw <S%G1492><s%> it, they all <S%G537><s%> murmured, <S%G1234><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> That he was gone <S%G1525><s%> to be guest <S%G2647><s%> with a man <S%G435><s%> that is a sinner. <S%G268><s%>

And Zacchaeus <S%G2195><s%> stood, <S%G2476><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to the Lord: <S%G2962><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> the half <S%G2255><s%> of my goods <S%G5224><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> to the poor; <S%G4434><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> I have taken any <S%G5100><s%> thing from any <S%G1536><s%> man by false <S%G4811><s%> accusation, <S%G4811><s%> I restore <S%G591><s%> him fourfold. <S%G5073><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, This <S%G4594><s%> day <S%G4594><s%> is salvation <S%G4991><s%> come <S%G1096><s%> to this <S%G5129><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> as much <S%G2530><s%> as he also <S%G2532><s%> is a son <S%G5207><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>
For the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> to seek <S%G2212><s%> and to save <S%G4982><s%> that which was lost. <S%G622><s%>

And as they heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, he added <S%G4369><s%> and spoke <S%G2036><s%> a parable, <S%G3850><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> he was near <S%G1451><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and because they thought <S%G1380><s%> that the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> should <S%G3195><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> appear. <S%G398><s%>

He said <S%G2036><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> A certain <S%G5100><s%> nobleman <S%G2104><s%> <S%G444><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a far <S%G3117><s%> country <S%G5561><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> for himself <S%G1438><s%> a kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and to return. <S%G5290><s%>

And he called <S%G2564><s%> his ten <S%G1176><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> and delivered <S%G1325><s%> them ten <S%G1176><s%> pounds, <S%G3414><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Occupy <S%G4231><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> I come. <S%G2064><s%>

But his citizens <S%G4177><s%> hated <S%G3404><s%> him, and sent <S%G649><s%> a message <S%G4242><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> We will <S%G2309><s%> not have this <S%G5126><s%> man to reign <S%G936><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> us.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> he was returned, <S%G1880><s%> having received <S%G2983><s%> the kingdom, <S%G932><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> he commanded <S%G2036><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to be called <S%G5455><s%> to him, to whom <S%G3739><s%> he had given <S%G1325><s%> the money, <S%G694><s%> that he might know <S%G1097><s%> how <S%G5101><s%> much every <S%G5101><s%> man had gained <S%G1281><s%> by trading. <S%G1281><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> the first, <S%G4413><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> your pound <S%G3414><s%> has gained <S%G4333><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> pounds. <S%G3414><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Well, <S%G2095><s%> you good <S%G18><s%> servant: <S%G1401><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you have been <S%G1096><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> in a very <S%G1646><s%> little, <S%G1646><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> you authority <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1883><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> cities. <S%G4172><s%>
And the second <S%G1208><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> your pound <S%G3414><s%> has gained <S%G4160><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> pounds. <S%G3414><s%>
And he said <S%G2036><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> to him, Be you also <S%G2532><s%> over <S%G1883><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> cities. <S%G4172><s%>

And another <S%G2087><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> here is your pound, <S%G3414><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> kept <S%G2192><s%> laid <S%G606><s%> up in a napkin: <S%G4676><s%>

For I feared <S%G5399><s%> you, because <S%G3754><s%> you are an austere <S%G840><s%> man: <S%G444><s%> you take <S%G142><s%> up that you layed <S%G5087><s%> not down, and reap <S%G2325><s%> that you did not sow. <S%G4687><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Out of your <S%G4675><s%> own mouth <S%G4750><s%> will I judge <S%G2919><s%> you, you wicked <S%G4190><s%> servant. <S%G1401><s%> You knew <S%G1492><s%> that I was an austere <S%G840><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> taking <S%G142><s%> up that I laid <S%G5087><s%> not down, and reaping <S%G2325><s%> that I did not sow: <S%G4687><s%>

Why <S%G1302><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> not you my money <S%G694><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the bank, <S%G5132><s%> that at my coming <S%G2064><s%> I might have required <S%G4238><s%> my <S%G846><s%> own with usury? <S%G5110><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them that stood <S%G3936><s%> by, Take <S%G142><s%> from him the pound, <S%G3414><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> it to him that has <S%G2192><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> pounds. <S%G3414><s%>
(And they said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> he has <S%G2192><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> pounds. <S%G3414><s%> )

For I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That to every <S%G3956><s%> one which <S%G3588><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> shall be given; <S%G1325><s%> and from him that has <S%G2192><s%> not, even <S%G2532><s%> that he has <S%G2192><s%> shall be taken <S%G142><s%> away from him.

But those <S%G1565><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> enemies, <S%G2190><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> not that I should reign <S%G936><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them, bring <S%G71><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> and slay <S%G2695><s%> them before <S%G1715><s%> me.
And when he had thus <S%G5023><s%> spoken, <S%G2036><s%> he went <S%G4198><s%> before, <S%G1715><s%> ascending <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, when <S%G5613><s%> he was come <S%G1448><s%> near <S%G1448><s%> to Bethphage <S%G967><s%> and Bethany, <S%G963><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> the mount of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

Saying, <S%G2036><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> you into <S%G1519><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> over <S%G2713><s%> against <S%G2713><s%> you; in the which <S%G3739><s%> at your entering <S%G1531><s%> you shall find <S%G2147><s%> a colt <S%G4454><s%> tied, <S%G1210><s%> where on <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> yet never <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G444><s%> sat: <S%G2523><s%> loose <S%G3089><s%> him, and bring <S%G71><s%> him here.

And if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man ask <S%G2065><s%> you, Why <S%G1302><s%> do you loose <S%G3089><s%> him? thus <S%G3779><s%> shall you say <S%G2046><s%> to him, Because <S%G3754><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of him.
And they that were sent <S%G649><s%> went <S%G565><s%> their way, and found <S%G2147><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as he had said <S%G2036><s%> to them.
And as they were loosing <S%G3089><s%> the colt, <S%G4454><s%> the owners <S%G2962><s%> thereof said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Why <S%G5101><s%> loose <S%G3089><s%> you the colt? <S%G4454><s%>
And they said, <S%G2036><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of him.

And they brought <S%G71><s%> him to Jesus: <S%G2424><s%> and they cast <S%G1977><s%> their garments <S%G2440><s%> on the colt, <S%G4454><s%> and they set <S%G1913><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> thereon. <S%G1913><s%>
And as he went, <S%G4198><s%> they spread <S%G5291><s%> their clothes <S%G2440><s%> in the way. <S%G3598><s%>

And when he was come <S%G1448><s%> near, <S%G1448><s%> even <S%G2536><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the descent <S%G2600><s%> of the mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> the whole <S%G537><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to rejoice <S%G5463><s%> and praise <S%G134><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> the mighty <S%G1411><s%> works that they had seen; <S%G1492><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> be the King <S%G935><s%> that comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord: <S%G2962><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and glory <S%G1391><s%> in the highest. <S%G5310><s%>
And some <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> from among the multitude <S%G3793><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Master, <S%G1320><s%> rebuke <S%G2008><s%> your disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

And he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, I tell <S%G3004><s%> you that, if <S%G1437><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> should hold <S%G4623><s%> their peace, <S%G4623><s%> the stones <S%G3037><s%> would immediately cry <S%G2896><s%> out.
And when <S%G5613><s%> he was come <S%G1448><s%> near, <S%G1448><s%> he beheld <S%G1492><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and wept <S%G2799><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> it,

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> you had known, <S%G1097><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> you, at <S%G1065><s%> least <S%G2534><s%> in this <S%G5026><s%> your day, <S%G2250><s%> the things which belong to your peace! <S%G1515><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> they are hid <S%G2928><s%> from your <S%G4675><s%> eyes. <S%G3788><s%>

For the days <S%G2250><s%> shall come <S%G2240><s%> on you, that your <S%G4675><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> shall cast <S%G4016><s%> a trench <S%G5482><s%> about <S%G4016><s%> you, and compass <S%G4033><s%> you round, <S%G4033><s%> and keep <S%G4912><s%> you in on <S%G3840><s%> every <S%G3840><s%> side, <S%G3840><s%>

And shall lay <S%G1474><s%> you even with the ground, <S%G1474><s%> and your children <S%G5043><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> you; and they shall not leave <S%G863><s%> in you one stone <S%G3037><s%> on another; because <S%G473><s%> <S%G3739><s%> you knew <S%G1097><s%> not the time <S%G2540><s%> of your visitation. <S%G1984><s%>

And he went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and began <S%G756><s%> to cast <S%G1544><s%> out them that sold <S%G4453><s%> therein, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> and them that bought; <S%G59><s%>

Saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, It is written, <S%G1125><s%> My house <S%G3624><s%> is the house <S%G3624><s%> of prayer: <S%G4335><s%> but you have made <S%G4160><s%> it a den <S%G4693><s%> of thieves. <S%G3027><s%>

And he taught <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1321><s%> daily <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> in the temple. <S%G2411><s%> But the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and the chief <S%G4413><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> him,

And could not find <S%G2147><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> they might do: <S%G4160><s%> for all <S%G537><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> were very <S%G1582><s%> attentive <S%G1582><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> him.
